title: Interpretation of hair removal in a dream with a blade or razor for unmarried or married women

preview.html: Removing hair is necessary for both men and women, and seeing it in a dream can be good or portend harm to the viewer, so together we will learn about the interpretation of hair removal in a dream according to its interpretation by the scholar Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi.Interpretation of hair removal in a dreamThe scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of hair removal In a dream, it is good news, as long as the hair is missing, and it may indicate relief from worry and anxiety. In fact, he owes a debt. The vision here indicates the approaching repayment of that debt, and God knows best. The Nabulsi scholar interpreted this vision as justice in the debt and recovery from an illness. Whoever sees that he is shaving his stomach hair, this indicates that his needs will be satisfied and his condition will improve. If the dreamer is poor, this indicates his wealth and relief from his worries. But if the dreamer sees himself shaving his pubic hair and leaving part of it unshaven, this means that some of his worries will go away and some will remain, and some of his money may go away or some may go away by His grace. Wife. If a married man dreams that he is shaving, the vision portends the death of worries. Seeing him using a razor may symbolize his wife’s scandal, and seeing a shaving tool in a married man’s dream indicates his cruelty. For his household, and whoever sees that he goes to the barber to remove hair, this indicates his love and concern for his wife. The dream indicates the illness of his wife or son, and God knows best. Hair removal in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is removing excess hair from her body, then the vision here symbolizes the approaching pregnancy, and if she sees herself buying a razor, this indicates revealing her husband’s secrets, but If she sees herself removing her body hair with a razor, the vision symbolizes her harshness in raising her children, and seeing the blade in a dream indicates that she will be disappointed with her husband. Seeing her removing her facial hair means resolving disputes with her husband, and seeing her hand wax symbolizes her help to her husband and seeing her Shaving her hair shows her weakness towards her husband, but if she sees herself going to the beauty salon, it symbolizes her happiness with her husband. Interpretation of a dream about hair removal for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees that she is removing her facial hair, this indicates her imminent conflict or her weakness before her Lord and the lack of commitment that she faced. In the past period. The vision can also symbolize the money and favor that she will enjoy, her good morals and her reputation among people, but if she sees herself using a razor to remove hair, this is a sign of positive changes that will happen to her in the near future. Or her husband is getting close to someone she loves and is close to achieving her goals. Removing hair from the body in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will lose many things and waste her time on useless things. Removing hair in a dream for a divorced woman. Removing hair in a dream for a divorced woman indicates loss. Anxiety and sadness, buying a razor reveals her secrets to an untrustworthy person, and using a razor is evidence of her strength towards her ex-husband. Husband, while the razor in her dream is a sign of injustice from those close to her. You may also be interested in:

title: Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman: Scientists have interpreted seeing a camel in a dream as a sign of many trials from God Almighty, and he must be patient and accept what God has written, whether it is good or bad. If a married woman is looking for work and sees a camel in her dream, then this It is an indication that a married woman will soon have opportunities to work in the field of trade. However, if a married woman sees camels while she is sick, this is an indication of the psychological pressure that accompanies her from the many responsibilities, but she hides this thing and the burden from those around her. Some commentators have interpreted it as meaning that her husband thinks about her in a negative way. Different, and that is why she does not have the ability to understand him, because her husband is jealous of her and restricts her in many matters. While she saw the camel in black, this indicates her courage and that she always acts skillfully and intelligently in any situation she faces. Also, seeing the camel raging is an indication that the owner The dream is that she gets angry quickly and this results in a lot of problems with her husband, so she needs to change and become calmer. It becomes different when a married woman sees a camel in white, then this dream is a sign of freedom from distress and that she will enjoy a lot of prosperity and well-being in the near future. Likewise, the brown beauty that a married woman sees is evidence of her love for him and her loyalty to her partner, and that she always stands by him in the most difficult times, and supports him in many matters. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a camel in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing a camel in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a camel for a woman For a married woman, it is an indication that she will soon receive a large material sign from an unknown man, and this dream is a sign of her intelligence and that she has many skills. But if a married woman sees camels and is in a dark place, then this dream is a sign of distraction, loss, and great weakness for not making a specific decision or not Acting on a specific issue. Also, a camel in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is arrogant and in a bad mood, so she needs to change to gain people’s love and respect for her. If a married woman sees in a dream that a camel is running fast, then this dream is a sign of this woman’s determination. On success. She is always working hard, and does not find time to rest or pamper herself. In the case of a camel he was riding upside down in a dream. This will be a sign that he will soon meet a bad friend and he should be careful. Also, if the camel is still and not moving This is an indication that her husband will soon return from the trip. She will spend many pleasant moments with him. Likewise, a camel that stops running unexpectedly and sits still is an indication that the married woman will soon suffer from many diseases. Seeing yourself running away from a camel In a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a camel running away from her in a dream, then this dream is a sign of someone’s desire to harm her. But it shows him that he loves him, so he must pay attention and not be deceived by appearances. But if the camel hits him and he is unable to escape from the camel. This is

title: Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The chameleon is a type of reptile that is found in many places in the world and lives in crevices. Insects and seeing a chameleon in a dream have many interpretations, and this is what we will discuss in this article. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a chameleon in a dream as not good for the dreamer, and seeing a chameleon can indicate war, and this interpretation is based on the similarity of letters between the chameleon and war, Seeing a chameleon can indicate kings and chameleons. Rulers.Interpretation of seeing a chameleon for a single woman. A single woman who sees a chameleon in a dream has many interpretations that differ depending on the color of the chameleon in the dream. Seeing a gray chameleon in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates a lack of clarity in some issues in her life, and these issues may be related to marriage. As for Seeing a red chameleon in a dream indicates impulsiveness, bad behavior, and making wrong and inappropriate decisions, which forces you to be careful and vigilant. As for seeing a black chameleon, this dream is not good for a single girl, and indicates the presence of a person in her life who represents some problems and obstacles in her life, Whether in his work or his love life. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a chameleon in a dream indicates unwanted changes in her life and a change in her situation for the worse. Seeing a green chameleon in a married woman’s dream, this solution is praiseworthy and may indicate joy And the life and happiness that you enjoy. And we see landing a chameleon in a dream, this is a sign of its goodness and the disappearance of worries and sorrows. As for the woman who sees a chameleon eating tree leaves, this dream is praiseworthy and an indication of goodness. As for the one who saw a chameleon eating in her house, this dream is not suitable for her. If she dreams of chameleon meat In a dream, a married woman, this dream shows the good that will come, God willing, and it could refer to a brother, husband, or father. As for her who saw a cooked chameleon in a dream, this dream is excellent food for her and it may indicate the approaching pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant chameleon In a dream, if a pregnant woman sees a black chameleon, this indicates that the child is male. As for who she sees in the dream? The green chameleon. This dream is good for her safety and the safety of her fetus. If she sees a red chameleon, then this dream indicates the approaching date of birth. Interpretation of seeing a chameleon bite in a dream: Seeing a chameleon bite in a dream has many interpretations and explanations. Whoever dreams that he is bitten by a green chameleon, this is a good sign for the fortuneteller and indicates the recovery of an illness for the patient and may indicate its disappearance. Of sadness and grief. As for seeing a red chameleon bite the dreamer, this is an unpleasant dream and indicates that the dreamer is affected by evil, whether in his money, himself, or his possessions. As for seeing the bite of a black chameleon in a dream, this indicates the hatred, evil, and hatred of some people around the fortuneteller. A yellow chameleon bites, then this dream is not good. Therefore, we present

title: Interpretation of a dream about running in a dream

preview.html: Running or jogging is a type of beneficial sport that doctors recommend to stimulate blood circulation, but not all jogging is for sporting purposes. Running can be for fear of something or escaping from a person and other reasons that make a person run, and all of this makes the interpretation of seeing running in a dream variable, as we will explain to you.Interpretation of seeing a bird in a dream.Interpretation of seeing yourself running in a dream Al-OsaimiFahd Al-Osaimi believes that running in a dream It may be due to the presence of negative energy inside the dreamer and he is trying to release this energy. Running to escape from something that is frightening to the dreamer is one of the signs that the dreamer is escaping from a problem or crisis he is in and is not trying to find solutions to this problem. Running in the dream may indicate that The dreamer is trying to escape from the financial crisis that she is experiencing at this period in his life. Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about running in a dream for a single woman. Running in an unmarried girl’s dream could be the result of this girl’s engagement to a young man she does not love or does not want to consummate her marriage. If an unmarried girl sees herself running with a group of friends in a dream, this means that she is competing with them academically or professionally, depending on the girl’s situation in reality. Running in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is seeking to reach her dreams quickly and is seeking to achieve a leading position in her life. Professional.Interpretation of a dream about a bridge in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about running in a dream for a married woman. A married woman running in a dream is trying to escape from the crises and problems she faces in her current life. Running in a married woman’s dream indicates insecurity in her married life with her husband and the internal desire to separate from her husband. Running in a married woman’s dream indicates the difficulty and difficulties that the woman feels in reaching her children safely. Interpretation of a dream about copper in a dream. Running in a dream for a man. If running is for the purpose of escape in a man’s dream, this indicates the dreamer’s ability to overcome the trials and difficulties that he faces. He is experiencing it in his current life. Organized running in a dream indicates that this person organizes his thinking and makes the right decisions that help him achieve his goals. A single man who dreams that he is running may be a sign that this young man has made a great effort to marry the girl he loves. Interpretation Seeing a dream about sugar in a dream. Difficulty running in a dream. Difficulty running in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face difficulties in obtaining money that meets his needs. Difficulty running also indicates controlling the psychological pressures and problems of the dreamer, which makes him feel frustrated. Difficulty in achieving a woman’s dream indicates A married woman indicates that this woman will be delayed in having children for several years. If the dreamer is in debt, the difficulty of running in the dream may indicate the continuation of this debt for a period of time in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream of execution in a dream. Running race in a dream. The dreamer who enters a race Running and winning means that this person will get an important presidential position in his own business. Run S

title: Eating in a dream for single people

preview.html: Eating in a dream for individuals and in various other cases. Food is the fuel that provides the body with energy to be able to carry out vital activities. Each food has a different benefit for the body, depending on the minerals and vitamins that the food contains, which varies from one type to another. It is certain that the dream of food in a dream is A dream that carries a lot of connotations, because in this dream there are many details that differ according to the interpretation of the dream, for this reason we present to you today an encyclopedia with more details. Interpretation of food in a dream for a single woman: First: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a single woman eating in a dream: See Interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that if a poor, unmarried girl sees herself eating meat in a dream, this is a sign that God will provide it for her soon. It contains hot pepper, which is a sign that her life will be filled with problems and troubles, and if she cannot swallow food, her dream portends a serious illness. If a girl sees that she is preparing food for a sick person, this is a sign that she will recover from the illness, God willing, and enjoy good health. But if Food cooks quickly during cooking. A sign that desires will come true soon. If a girl sees that someone is putting food in her mouth, this is a sign that this person is reminding her of goodness and praising him in front of people, but whoever puts hot pepper in her mouth is talking about it. Badly. And seeing an unmarried woman who does not want to eat, but thanks to God Almighty for his presence, she may go through some difficult things in her life, but she will overcome them soon, and if the dreamer feels happy when he sees food in a dream, this is good news about happiness that will soon overwhelm her. Second: Interpretation of seeing food in an unmarried woman’s dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi adds to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation that eating yellow is a sign of illness that may afflict the viewer, eating white is a sign of goodness and nourishment for him, and seeing food on happy occasions or gatherings is a sign of the coming. It is good news for the viewer, such as success in the search for knowledge or gaining knowledge in a job at work, or in marriage, God willing, but whoever sees that he is eating food with condolences, he may have many worries and sorrows. Third: Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the vision An unmarried woman eating in a dream: Ibn Shaheen explains that if she finds herself eating from a bowl of gold or silver, this is a sign that she is carrying a lot of debts, but if she eats with people around her, this indicates her desire, and in the case of eating with a fork. And a knife, this is a sign that he does not make quick decisions. Ibn Shaheen points out that eating fruits and vegetables is a sign that goodness and nutrition will reach the pioneer. In the desert and with its people, this is a sign of her travels, God willing. Seeing food in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman finds that she is eating large amounts of food and is not satisfied, this is a sign that she is still adhering to the sound principles on which she was raised and is distinguished by her high morals and etiquette. Eating food at weddings in a dream indicates the coming of goodness and perhaps

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black bisht for a single, married woman named Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black bisht for Ibn Sirin, unmarried and married, the word bisht is a word of Gulf origin that all Gulf countries face, and it is a black cloak with a golden edge that is worn over the male cloak, and the rest of the Arabic dialects that they pronounce. In the name of Mishla and Bisht is the outfit. The advent of the Ottoman Empire, which changed all the systems in it, including the clothing of citizens, and seeing it in reality gives dignity and prestige to the one who wears it, and for this reason many wanted to obtain all the information revolving around the topic of interpreting black dreams for Ibn Sirin, unmarried and married, and the following is all the information revolving around the question of answering it. And whoever sees in a dream that her husband is the one wearing the black jacket and walking in a certain way, this dream indicates the famous position of her husband that she will obtain, God willing. And a married woman sees in a dream that her child is wrapped in a black bag, this dream shows that this child will be of great value in society and will raise her head high, God willing. Whoever has a girl of marriageable age and sees in a dream that her husband is standing and hanging a black bust in the house, this indicates the approaching date of the girl's marriage. As for seeing herself in a dream sitting among a group of women and wearing black, this dream indicates her prestigious position among them. The worn and torn black bisht is an indication of the deterioration of her husband's position and value in the eyes of the world. And whoever sees that her husband removes the bisht from above in a dream and throws him out of the house, this dream indicates that there are a large number of family problems that will arise between her and her husband, which may lead to separation and divorce. He is higher and knows better. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a desk drawer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a desk drawer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing a desk drawer in a dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems and shows an abundance of means of living. This vision also indicates an abundance of money and legal satisfaction, and it also indicates the death of disobedience and sins, repentance for them, and a return to God. This vision also shows a rich husband, an heir, or a rich wife, and it also indicates success in professional and material matters, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an office staircase in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she sees a wooden staircase or an office ladder, this indicates success, distinction, and high status. This vision also shows the abundance of supplies for her and her happy life full of love, joy and pleasure, and this vision shows travel. Also, seeing the desk drawer in a dream indicates her great benefit and satisfaction of the need and shows her close marriage to a good man and the marriage contract. Seeing the large desk drawer in the desk shows the girl’s life. This indicates that the girl will enter a new job and earn a lot of money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a desk drawer in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is closing her desk drawer, this indicates the collapse of her worries and the emergence of disputes between her and her husband. Also, seeing a desk drawer In a dream, it indicates her husband’s intense love for her, her imminent pregnancy, and providing her and her husband with fair offspring. Seeing a desk drawer with a lot of money indicates her husband’s brilliance in a new job and the high position he will be in, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a desk drawer in a dream for a pregnant womanIf the woman sees A pregnant woman dreams that the desk drawer is open and closes it, this indicates the ease of her birth and the end of her pain, and God knows best. This vision also shows the ease of giving birth to a male child, and shows his brilliance in the highest positions, and he will become a prince in the future. Interpretation of seeing a desk drawer in a dream for a man: If a man dreams that he sees a drawer The office, this indicates a lot of food that he will encounter and a lot of money will be saved. Also, this vision in a nice man’s dream shows his close marriage to a good girl, a spacious life, and a happy married life. This vision also indicates to the married man that the disputes that arise between him and his wife It will come, and indicates his obedience and appreciation for it. Interpretation of seeing a dresser drawer in a dream: If one sees in his dream that he is cleaning the office drawer, this means that the dreamer is interested in all the details and his future life and also indicates the abundance of money. This vision also shows excellence and success in the dreamer’s life, as It shows a life full of security and happiness and may indicate many trips outside the country. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing pineapple in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing pineapple in a dream by Ibn Sirin, as it is known that pineapple is one of the favorite fruits of many people and is considered beneficial for the body, and of course seeing it in a dream includes many interpretations and explanations, which are mostly positive interpretations, and the difference in these interpretations is based on what we see in the dream. From various scenes and details, and in this article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing pineapple in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pineapple in a dream by Ibn Sirin Pineapple is one of the wonderful fruits in its taste, which is considered a distinctive fruit for many, and if it is seen in a dream, this vision is one of the visions worthy of praise and carries many meanings. The positive connotations, and with this hadith, learn more about the interpretation of the dream of seeing pineapple in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is as follows: It should be noted that seeing a pineapple in a dream indicates the emergence of a new companionship for the dreamer. It also indicates his acquaintance with different people during the next period of his life. While if he sees Someone in his dream is that he is drinking pineapple juice, or that he is offering it. This dream is evidence that a lot of goodness and food will reach the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Also, seeing pineapple juice in a dream for the dreamer is a sign of getting rid of anxiety and the person getting rid of problems, anxiety, and fatigue. See Also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a horse in a dream for a married and single woman. Interpretation of seeing pineapple in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees pineapple in her dream, it is considered a good vision, especially since it contains good meanings and different interpretations. The interpretation of seeing pineapple in a dream for a married woman is also: Seeing pineapple in a dream for a woman Married. It is a testimony to the presence of goodness around this woman and her family. It is also evidence of the presence of food and reassurance in her life, as it indicates the stability of her life, and her satisfaction in her life. God Almighty also rewarded her with happiness in her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if a married woman dreams that she She drinks pineapple juice. This is evidence of the presence of some new charity in the life of the dreamer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. He also desires this charity, or expects it, but he is not far from it. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing evil in a dream for single and married women. The symbol of pineapple in a single woman’s dream, by nature In fact, seeing pineapple in a dream for a single girl includes many good things, which are also different from others, and in this context we will learn about it. The symbol of pineapple in a single woman’s dream is also: Whereas, if a girl sees pineapple in a dream in the summer season, it is ripe. This The vision is a sign for the girl that she will marry the person she loves soon. Moreover, if the girl sees that she is eating pineapple quickly, God is Most High and All-Knowing. This vision indicates that this girl will face many problems in her life because of a family member, but this The problems will end quickly. Whereas if an unmarried girl dreams that she is throwing pineapples, this dream indicates that God Almighty will give her a happy marriage.

title: Interpretation of the letter S in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Nabulsi soap Soap in a dream is a statement of the money and benefits that the dreamer acquires. A piece of soap is evidence of the concern that the dreamer carries, and God willing, they will be fine. Seeing washing clothes with soap indicates the nearness of healing and sincere and reliable repentance, or the good news of relief from anxiety and acquittal, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about newspapers by Nabulsi Newspapers in a dream indicate good news and justice in the dreamer's circumstances, and it may be a sign of witnesses, companions, or scholars in the dreamer's life who seek to reform the dreamer's life and guide him in his affairs, and God knows best. Seeing the chest in a dream by Nabulsi The expansion of the chest in a dream is kindness and guidance in the dreamer's circumstances, and it is repentance in the sleep of the sinner and comfort after great difficulties, and the chest in a dream can reflect what the dreamer hides inside him of matters and secrets. Or the money that was kept. The breast can be a sign of the wife or taking positions, and the firm breast in the dream indicates problems and challenges, or losing money, or giving up the job, or disputes between spouses. The stone chest indicates worries, problems, and many challenges and obstacles that the dreamer is exposed to, and chest pain in a dream indicates the dreamer's punishment for a sin he committed, and the appearance of breasts on his back. A man's chest indicates the distress of marriage, and God knows best. Charity in a dream for Al-Nabulsi Charity in a dream means well-being, justice, removing worries and problems, and recovering from illness. It is also a sign of truth and honesty. It is also a sign of blessing in the dreamer's life, success in his affairs, and striving to achieve his goals, and God knows best. Prayer in a dream Al-Nabulsi Prayer in a dream indicates correctness and repentance, and as for seeing prayer from his side, it is a disease, and praying in the mosque is a great good for the dreamer, and praying while riding indicates extreme fear and terror in the dreamer's life. The lost prayer in a dream indicates the hardship and fatigue that afflicts the dreamer, and peace from prayer indicates the distress and calamities that afflict the dreamer, and God knows best. The cross in the dream of Nabulsi The cross is one of the symbols that indicate lying and a lot of gossip and backbiting or lying and obscenity, and it also refers to the great leader and the clergy, and the cross may indicate marriage or childbirth with a man, or it is a sign of worries and corruption, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of fasting by Nabulsi Fasting in a dream indicates fulfilling a vow, and breaking the fast without justification in a dream indicates illness or backwardness. As for complete fasting, it is an honor, repentance, and atonement for a vow or closeness to Hajj, and fasting in the month of Ramadan indicates the disappearance of worries and the proximity of comfort, repentance and repentance. Breaking the fast in the month of Ramadan in a dream intentionally indicates that the dreamer killed someone intentionally in his life or neglected one of the laws of religion, and in general, the good news almost relieves and removes worries and problems, and God knows best. The rock in the dream of Nabulsi Rocks in a dream are a symbol of a sick woman who is characterized by steadfastness, determination, firmness, challenge and longevity. Seeing a rock may indicate many women

title: Interpretation of a dream curse: Seeing a curse in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a curse in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of the curse of the motherInterpretation of a dream of a husband who insults his wifeInterpretation of a dream of a person who curses me Finding the living dead in a dreamInterpretation of insulting religion in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of Ibn Sirin’s reprimandReprimand in a dreamWhoever dreams that he insults a person in a way that is not permissible for him, then the one who sweats curses himself, for he sees that he is the one who He cursed, then made a mistake, perhaps the insult is from ancient times. The young man meant to rebuke. In the dream, the humiliation of censure and the glory of censure, unless he offends the humble, because it ends with the curse of censure. And whoever sees: whoever insults him insults the one who insults him, he wins and then wins. If you dream that you are cursing someone, this means that you will not be lucky in your affairs. You will lose a large amount of money by establishing business relationships with others tyrannically. If you feel that someone is mistreating you, you will be upset by the hostility of others in your daily endeavors. If a girl dreams that she hears bad language, this foretells that she will be condemned by someone’s envy and jealousy. If she uses this language herself, she will face unexpected ups and downs that may fill her with shame and remorse for her past frivolous behavior toward friends. If someone insults you in a dream, this foretells that problems and obstacles will arise in the work environment. After such a dream, the lover will doubt the loyalty of his partner. If you dream that you were insulted in front of your family, this means that your rude behavior will cause you quarrels at home. Interpretation of the dream is a curse or an insult to the phenomena. Whoever sees that he insulted a person in a way that is not permissible for him, then the violator will be cursed, and if the insult was from him in response to what his opponent insulted him, He rewards him with evil. According to the Almighty’s saying: “And the recompense for good deeds is like that.” Whoever dreams: that a ruler insults him, then this is a good event for him, and the dream comes out of it. Whoever sees: that he insults a person and then belittles them. Whoever dreams: that one of the righteous insults him for something hateful, then this indicates that he is wrong, let him repent. To God, and if he is the one who insulted him, then he is committing a mistake, and perhaps cursing because of that. Big to small indicates shame. Interpretation of seeing insult - YouTube
